So, I'd definitely be up for helping you build a compositing reel if you wanted to build something more specialist for VFX work. That doesn't mean you can't also build an animation or modeling reel or whatever later, but to get a foot in the door in VFX, a specialist reel will be helpful in my opinion and considering that you mentioned enjoying the compositing process I think it'd be a good way to go. Would you be interested in that? Also, have you done much rotoscoping or cleanup work before?
